author: archyde
title: Sacred Heart Canaanite Catholic Church: A New Chapter in Bensonville
text:
2023-12-29 22:15:11
Chicago: Sacred Heart Canaanite Catholic Forona Church in Maywood, America’s first Canaanite church, is moving to Bensonville with a more convenient location.
It is owned by St. Charles Borromeo Catholic Church in Bensonville, Diocese of Juliet. The new temple has a structure consisting of a church, school, priestly hall and a seven-quarter acre plot of land.
The new church has been acquired as part of the pastoral growth of Sacred Heart Knanaya Church established in Maywood in 2006. Ira’s big dream is being realized as a result of the parishioners’ prayers and generous financial support.
Juliet Diocese Abhi: Ronald Hicks and Chicago Diocese Abhi: Mar Joy Allappat Father’s timely interventions and leadership are gratefully recalled. The new church will be rededicated on Saturday, March 16, 2024.
Thanks and gratitude to the Church Executive, ‘Fund Raising Committee’ and those who provided financial support and other assistance to the parish vicar Fr.Thomas Mulavanal and Asst. Vicar Fr. Bins Chetali also informed.
1703888637
#church #Bensonville #blessing #Canaanite #people #Chicago

author: Sponsored article
title: Standing Strong with the Brave IDF Soldiers | Israel National News - Arutz Sheva
text: In a time of great crisis, a shining beacon of light emerges as we witness the unwavering dedication and unparalleled bravery of our cherished IDF soldiers. These selfless individuals have left behind everything - their homes, businesses, families, wives, and children - to stand on the frontlines of danger, fully aware of the possibility that they may never return. Every day, our courageous soldiers grapple with immense challenges as they put their lives on the line for the security of our nation. While we continue with our daily lives, they stand guard against relentless threats posed by rockets and missiles fired by terrorists. They confront fear head-on, unwavering in their determination to fulfill their missions to the very end. [All contributions are tax-deductible under 501(c)(3).](https://tsedakah.com/campaign/United-Jews-Magen-David-Inc/idfwarm?ref=Arutz7A1) While we are snug and warm at home, they are stationed in the harsh conditions of Israel's southern and northern regions, enduring freezing cold, heavy rains, and harsh weather conditions. They remain resilient and steadfast, embodying our nation's spirit of defense. Now, it is our duty to stand by them. Our soldiers deserve our unwavering support and assistance. We must ensure they have the essentials to stay warm, healthy, and strong in the field. We appeal to all friends of Israel to contribute to our campaign. Your generous donations will provide our heroic soldiers with thermal clothing, blankets, and heating equipment, ensuring their well-being and resilience. Let us express our gratitude for their sacrifices and make it known that we stand firmly with them. These heroes give their all for us, and it is time for us to give back. Together, we can make a difference and provide them with the essentials they need to continue safeguarding our homeland. Join us in supporting our heroes in harm's way. Your donation can save lives and make a world of difference for our brave IDF soldiers. The cost of one thermal and warm clothing kit for a soldier is $260. These heroes are giving their all for us, and the time has come for us to give back. Together, we can make a difference and provide them with the essentials they need to continue safeguarding our homeland. Join us in supporting our heroes in harm's way. Your donation can save lives and make a world of difference for our brave IDF soldiers.

organizations.name: brave idf soldiers | israel national news - arutz sheva

author: andres-alejandro
title: Intervienen barrio en el sur de Quito ante colapso de muro | Ecuador | Noticias | El Universo
text: El Municipio de Quito informa que realiza acciones en el talud en el barrio Virgen del Cisne, ubicado en el sur de la ciudad, ante el colapso de un muro de contención que afectó a la mesa vial. Se detalla que el equipo operativo de emergencia realizó actividades de mitigación urgente como la colocación de vallas jersey, señalización del área, colocación de plástico en el talud y la conformación de un sistema de conducción de agua lluvia que permite captarlas y desviarlas lejos del talud. En coordinación con la Empresa de Agua Potable, se identifica si existen filtraciones del sistema de alcantarillado o agua potable, sin embargo, en un primer análisis no se han verificado daños. Publicidad Además, se realizan estudios y ensayos para determinar de dónde proviene el agua subterránea que sería una de las causas de esta afectación. Con el propósito de precautelar la seguridad de los ciudadanos, esta calle permanecerá cerrada a la circulación vehicular. Para ello se coordina con la Agencia Metropolitana de Tránsito (AMT), cuyos agentes están en el sitio para el desvío y rutas alternas. (I)

author: VNExplorer
title: Sports bodies should have their funding cut if they push gender ideology amid concerns about trans players, report says
text:
Report warns gender ideology is risking the fairness and safety of competitions
Governing bodies should have their funding cut if they fail to protect female sports amid concern about trans- gender players, a leading think-tank says.
A report by the Policy Exchange warns that gender ideology is risking the fairness and safety of competitions for women and girls.
The analysis, which is backed by athletes including Martina Navratilova, Sharron Davies and Daley Thompson, highlights the major physical advantages which biological males have over females.
The winning woman at this year’s London Marathon would have been beaten by the 231st ranked male, it found.
And every British ‘long course’ swimming record set by an elite female swimmer has been beaten by a teenage boy. In addition, at least three female records set at 5k community Parkrun events are held by biological males.
Martina Navratilova of the USA takes part in the Legends All Access Hour at the Australian Open tennis tournament at Melbourne Park in Melbourne, Australia, in 2020
Sharron Davies at the Beauty Awards in London, in 2019
The report highlighted concerns about ‘gender self-ID’, saying it ‘fundamentally compromises fair and safe competition for women and girls within grassroots, amateur and elite sport’.
Policy Exchange is now calling on sport governing bodies, the UK Government and the International Olympic Committee to restrict categories for women and girls to biological females at all levels of sport.
Some 99.99 per cent of those taking part in sport and physical activity are not elite or professional, the report points out, meaning that grassroots competitions for females are ‘much more likely’ to be affected by the issue.
In county athletics championships, the winning male from the slowest county in the 1,500m race in 2023 would have beaten the winning female in 27 out of 33 counties, the think-tank said.
It recommends that the Department for Culture, Media and Sport should require all national governing bodies to update their policies within 12 months to ensure that there is a protected female single-sex category – and that they should lose taxpayer funding if they fail to do so.
Policy Exchange also says that Parkrun should be ordered to collect participant data based on biological sex and not gender identity, and update all relevant course records to reflect this within 12 months or lose tax- payer funding.
Former Olympic swimmer Ms Davies said: ‘There is a sense within sports policy that while we should protect the female category within elite sports, women and girls participating and competing at amateur levels should budge over.
Former British decathlete Daley Thompson at the Laureus World Sports Awards ceremony at the Verti Music Hall in Berlin, Germany, in 2020
‘They must ‘be kind’ and ‘inclusive’ while having to pretend it is not grossly unfair, demotivating and possibly unsafe to accommodate biological males within their races, teams and sports days.
‘Every sport, at every level, from grassroots to elite, must ensure that the female category is ringfenced for biological females.’
Ms Navratilova, the former world No 1 female tennis player and an 18-time grand slam champion, said: ‘Female sport must be protected otherwise we risk not only alienating a generation of women, but also taking away dreams and possibilities of fairness and winning for girls and women.’
Daley Thompson, two-time Olympic gold medallist in the decathlon, said: ‘We risk alienating a generation of young female athletes if we cannot promise them fair and safe play from the grassroots level to the top.
‘Categories exist to allow everyone the chance to participate, and the willingness to compromise this by policymakers within sport is a scandal.’
A spokesman for Sport England, which is responsible for developing grassroots sport, said: ‘In 2021, the Sports Council Equality Group published Transgender Inclusion in Domestic Sport Guidance. While it is up to sports to set their own rules, we work closely with all organisations we fund to ensure they meet all the agreed criteria and code for sports governance.
‘In this challenging and emotive area of policy, we understand and accept that there are a wide range of personal views, and we urge respectful discourse on this matter, and that sports consider their duty of care to all athletes.’

author: Mariana Andrade
title: Programa vai monitorar eventos climáticos e famílias vulneráveis em MG
text:
Programa vai monitorar eventos climáticos e famílias vulneráveis em MG
Segundo a Sudese-MG, o programa “Mapeia Minas” será capaz de prever desastres ambientais e mitigar seus eventuais impactos no estado
atualizado
Compartilhar notícia
O governo de
Minas Gerais, por meio da Secretaria de Estado de Desenvolvimento Social ( Sedese), vai lançar uma plataforma capaz de prever desastres ambientais e mitigar seus eventuais impactos. O foco é inibir a ocorrência de tragédias socioambientais no estado.
O programa “Mapeia Minas” será usado para monitorar barragens,
enchentes, secas e demais eventos climáticos, além de ter um sistema integrado da localização de famílias no CadÚnico em situação de vulnerabilidade ou que residem em áreas de risco.
Até o momento, não há previsão de quando o sistema será colocado em prática ou liberado para acesso público. O Metrópoles entrou em contato com a Sedese, mas não obteve respostas. O espaço segue aberto.
Nos últimos quatro anos, Minas Gerais vem sofrendo com problemas relacionados à
chuva. Entre 2021 e 2022, o estado registrou elevados volumes de precipitações e metade dos 853 municípios chegaram a entrar em situação de emergência ou calamidade. À época, cerca de 70 mil ficaram desabrigados ou desalojados.
De acordo com
levantamento da Coordenadoria Estadual de Defesa Civil (Cedec), no período chuvoso de 2023/2024 (entre 27/9 do ano passado e 31/3 deste ano) 2.833 pessoas foram desalojadas, 399 ficaram desabrigadas e seis vítimas morreram em decorrência das chuvas em MG.
Enquanto no período anterior (2022/2023), foram registrados 12.923 desalojados, 2.241 desabrigados, além de 22 mortes devido à chuva.
Mapeia Minas
Tudo começou quando a Sedese teve a ideia de construir uma rede de sistema que gerasse informações sobre as áreas de risco que existem em Minas Gerais, com informações da localização de famílias vulneráveis para implementar ações de prevenção a eventos climáticos extremos.
A plataforma do Mapa Minas usa dados de geolocalização que foram integrados a uma amostra da base de dados do Cadastro Único para Programas Sociais (
CadÚnico), bem como os alertas climáticos do Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia ( Inmet).
Com as informações, a Sedese pode fazer o georreferenciamento de pessoas e controlar os dados por meio de painéis, com o mapa apontando quando há alertas meteorológicos.
O Mapeia Minas possibilita fazer a busca por município e a verificação da quantidade e o local onde estão as pessoas em situação de risco, de acordo com as previsões meteorológicas, visando uma ação preventiva.
A iniciativa é de autoria da SoftwareOne, AWS e governo de Minas Gerais. Também participaram do desenvolvimento do sistema o Ministério Público, Corpo de Bombeiros, Defesa Civil de MG e entidades que atuam em casos de desastres ambientais.

title: Azeri FM reports positive results in peace process with Armenia - Panorama | Armenian news
text: [Politics](https://www.panorama.am/en/news/politics)17:06 28/12/2023 Region Azeri FM reports positive results in peace process with Armenia Azerbaijani Foreign Minister Jeyhun Bayramov positively assesses the progress in negotiations with Armenia on a bilateral peace treaty. "The peace process with Armenia yielded certain positive results at the end of 2023. They were achieved as a result of direct contacts between Baku and Yerevan," he told a press conference on Thursday. Bayramov expressed hope for more direct talks with Armenia in 2024. "In the meantime, we are working on a peace treaty. In particular, we have presented our package of proposals to Armenia," the foreign minister added. author: EFE
title: ¿Kamala 2024? Biden respalda a Harris y dice que ‘está calificada para ser presidenta’
text: El [presidente de Estados Unidos, Joe Biden](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/mundo/2024/07/11/el-avi n-joe-biden-se-confunde-otra-vez-ahora-llama-presidente-putin-a-zelenski/), expresó este jueves su confianza en la [vicepresidenta, Kamala Harris](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/mundo/2024/07/03/kamala-harris-admite-que-biden-no-ha-tenido-su-mejor-momento-pero-esta-a-favor-de-su-candidatura/), afirmando que no la habría elegido como su compañera de fórmula en las elecciones de 2020 si no estuviera convencido de que podría ejercer el cargo de la Presidencia “desde el principio”. “No la habría elegido si no hubiera pensado que estaba cualificada para ser presidenta desde el principio. No me ando con rodeos en eso. Ella está cualificada para ser presidenta”, afirmó el mandatario en una rueda de prensa en los márgenes de la cumbre de la OTAN en Washington. Harris suena como la única opción viable si [Biden se viera obligado a retirarse de la contienda](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/mundo/2024/07/10/fracaso-en-el-debate-de-joe-biden-rompe-la-casa-blanca-criticas-sobre-su-candidatura-salen-a-flote/) a estas alturas de la campaña, a un mes de la convención del partido demócrata, debido a las dudas sobre su edad (81 años) y su capacidad para renovar un mandato de cuatro años en noviembre. En la esperada rueda de prensa, la primera en solitario desde noviembre, Biden alabó a su vicepresidenta, que en ante una hipotética incapacidad del mandatario asumiría el poder. “Ha manejado temas de libertad de los cuerpos de la mujeres y el control de sus cuerpos muy bien. Segundo, ha mostrado capacidad de manera casi cualquier tema. Es una dura fiscal. Es una sola frase: es muy buena”, insistió Biden. Las encuestas tras en debate presidencial del 27 de junio contra el [republicano Donald Trump](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/mundo/2024/07/10/trump-llama-dormilon-a-biden-lo-reta-a-otro-debate-para-que-demuestre-que-puede-ser-presidente/) dan una mayor ventaja a Harris en una hipotético enfrentamiento electoral en noviembre si Biden se retirase por las presiones de algunos miembros de su partido. El mal desempeño del mandatario en ese cara a cara elevó las dudas sobre su capacidad de vencer a Trump en noviembre y de seguir en el poder un segundo mandato, que finalizaría a los 86 años. [Biden ha rechazado retirarse](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/mundo/2024/07/10/nancy-pelosi-pide-a-joe-biden-repensar-candidatura-a-la-presidencia-que-dijo/) y aseguró hoy de nuevo que es el mejor posicionado para vencer a Trump.

author: Admin
title: “Chapters of My Life”: An Intriguing and Motivating Story of Life Triumph Leading to Transformation
text:
Tommy Sipper writes his memoir titled Chapters of My Life that takes readers through a memorable and evocative of his growing up in a rural South Alabama town. Readers are offered a window through which they view the author’s complexities of adolescence, adulthood, and being a family man.
In the background of the winding creek and sprawling fields in the heart of the Deep South, Tommy expertly provides a well-detailed story of his formative years. This section of the book offers the essence of rural life and the tremendous impact it has made on his life. The idyllic nature of the rural town of Alabama is filled with happiness and lots of storytelling that contributed to shaping his character.
As the narrative of the book is unfurled, readers are invited into Tommy’s world to see the challenges and opportunities he encountered on his way through adolescence into adulthood. Chapters of My Life provides readers with a reflection on the benefits of resilience and happiness. According to one of the narratives of this book, happiness is a journey, not a destination.
Readers who did not grow up in the South are bound to enjoy this book. Reviews from readers have been raving and glowing. Some readers describe Chapters of My Life as relative and inspiring while others see it as a testament of resilience and optimism. This memoir resonates well with readers looking to tap into the transformative power of storytelling.
Tommy celebrates the spirit of unity and the enduring bonds of a community through this memoir. His unwavering spirit to connect with his roots is enthralling and encourages readers to take a leaf out of his book.
Growing up Tommy came across challenges and adversities. He tells his endurance story to encourage others to persevere in the face of adversity. The author also tells the beautiful story of raising a family.
The author’s incredible storytelling ability contributes to making this memoir unique and among the bestselling memoirs.
Chapters of My Life is available to be purchased on major online retail stores such as
Amazon. You can grab a copy today and take a walk down the memory lane all the way to the rural South Alabama town with Tommy Speller.
